original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 11.15. Vitakkattikādi, Kusalattika
analyzed: vitakkattika ādi kusalattika

original: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkavicāramattaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkaavicāraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa vitakka sa vicāram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na a vitakka vicāra mattam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na a vitakka a vicāram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa, ārammaṇe sattacattālīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane chacattālīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa ārammaṇe sattacattālīsa pe purejāte āsevane cha cattālīsa pe avigate aṭṭha cattālīsa

original: Napītisahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasukhasahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na sukha sahagatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na upekkhā sahagatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa …pe… purejāte āsevane aṭṭhacattālīsa …pe… avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa pe purejāte āsevane aṭṭhacattālīsa pe avigate ekūnapaññāsa

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na kusala

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetuka

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam na kusala

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Naācayagāmiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naapacayagāmiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ācaya gāmim na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na apacaya gāmim na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na neva ācaya gāminā apacaya gāmim na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasekkhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasekkhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevāsekkhanāsekkhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sekkham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na asekkham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na nevāsekkha na asekkham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe āsevane nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Naparittaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namahaggataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na parittam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na mahaggatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na appamāṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā bāttiṁsa, ārammaṇe sattavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tiṁsa …pe… avigate bāttiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā bāttisa ārammaṇe sattavīsa pe aññamaññe tisa pe avigate bāttisa

original: Naparittārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namahaggatārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na paritta ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na mahaggata ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na appamāṇa ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahīnaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namajjhimaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napaṇītaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hīnam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na majjhimam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na paṇītam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa, vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe āsevane sattarasa vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Namicchattaniyataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasammattaniyataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naaniyataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na micchatta niyatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na sammatta niyatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na aniyatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Namaggārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namaggahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namaggādhipatiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na magga ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na magga hetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na magga adhipatim na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Naanuppannaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nauppādiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na anuppannam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na auppādim na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Naatītaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāgataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na atītam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na anāgatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Naatītārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāgatārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na atīta ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na anāgata ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na paccuppanna ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Naajjhattaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabahiddhā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na ajjhattam na akusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na bahiddhā na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na ajjhatta ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na bahiddha ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca
